text: was a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Marutani played for Osaka SC which was founded by his alma mater Meisei Commercial High School graduates and many Japan national team players Yoshimatsu Oyama, Toshio Miyaji, Uichiro Hatta and Sakae Takahashi were playing in those days. In May 1925, Marutani was selected the Japan national team for Far Eastern Championship Games in Manila. At this competition, on May 20, he debuted against Republic of China. But Japan lost in this match (0-2). ==Statistics== Japan National Football Team Database |- |1925||1||0 |- !Total||1||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japan international footballers
title: Kiyonosuke Marutani
